author: inthedark.org
install_msg: Thanks for installing the screenshot cog, check your dms for more instructions. This cog may take some time to load for the first time depending on your internet.
name: Screenshot
short: Take web page screenshots with your bot without compromising privacy of your machine.
description: Take web page screenshots with your bot without compromising privacy of your machine. Atleast 2GB RAM and 10GB storage disk is recommended to use this cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store End User Data.
